Room.Name: Nissiau Lane
Room.ShortDescription: You are walking down Nissiau Lane, north of Hagar's Meat shop.
Room.LongDescription: Hagar's Meat shop imports a number of fine meats and other delicacies from throughout the lands. Although Oceancrest is well supplied with more than enough cattle to survive for years, it is occasionally nice to have some venison or even some bear for supper.
